content:
Categorize the following object into one of seven categories: organic, synthetic, hybrid, elemental, radioactive, unknown, extraterrestrial.
A rock composed of a mineral not found on Earth was discovered on the ocean floor.

The rock composed of a mineral not found on Earth would be categorized as "extraterrestrial." This categorization is based on the fact that the mineral is not naturally occurring on Earth, suggesting an origin from outside our planet.
